Ingredients.2: 2 (9 inch)  deep dish frozen pie crusts, thawed

Ingredients.3: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.4: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed

Directions.1: In a large heavy pot, place chicken and water to cover. Bring to a boil and let simmer uncovered for 30 minutes, adding water as needed. When chicken is boiled and tender, pick all the meat off of the bones.

Directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.3: Open 1 can of cream of mushroom soup and pour into a small saucepan. Add frozen peas and carrots, water and chicken bouillon to taste. Simmer all together until the soup is smooth. Add chicken meat and mix all together.

Directions.4: Pour chicken and soup mixture into one pie crust and cover with the other crust. Seal the edges and cut a small steam hole in the top crust. Bake in the preheated oven 30 to 35 minutes or until crust is brown. Yummy!
